messages.subject: Tsuba for sale - Crass commercial Sale
messages.msgSnippet: HI All, I am offering up a few of my tsuba before my trip to Japan ( funding exercise :-) These will go onto Ebay in 5 days to a week so I thought I would
messages.messageBody:
HI All, I am offering up a few of my tsuba before my trip to Japan (
funding exercise :-) These will go onto Ebay in 5 days to a week so I
thought I would offer them here before I did that. If there is any
interest, please contact me @ ikkanshi@...

Rich Turner
